translation.ko: 그럴 리가요 신의 이름으로 그럴 수 없어요 - 신이 축복하시는데 - 아니, 아포스틀레

translation.en: No, Apostle, how can I be happy?
translation.ko: - 신이 축복하시는데 - 아니, 아포스틀레 내가 어떻게 행복하겠어?

translation.en: When some small rat
wants to eat and destroy everything I...
translation.ko: 먹이를 쫓아서 모든 걸 무너트리려고 하는데

translation.en: everything we all worked for.
[man] I will be rat.
Now that we have a full table, can we address--
translation.ko: 이제 다들 모였으니... - 슬슬 시작... - 아코레데

translation.en: Akorede, we are mates now, right?
That I have to wait for you.
[in Yoruba] What a pity, what a pity, what a pity.
translation.ko: 안 된 일입니다 진짜 안 된 일이야

translation.en: You have taken your finger,
dipped it in hot pepper and poked your mother in the eye with it.
translation.ko: 어미 등에 그 칼을 꽂는 격이군

translation.en: My name is Makanaki and I don't have a mother.
[in Pidgin] Maka, respect the crown. What is wrong with you?
translation.ko: 마카, 킹한테 그러면 안 돼 왜 그래?

translation.en: What crown are you talking about?
You all fear a lion that has lost its claws and teeth.
translation.ko: 다들 이빨 빠진 사자를 무서워하고 있군요

translation.en: Old glory, old school.
A mother who can't take care of her children.
She's making money from politics.
[in English] She has no time for us.
When last has anyone at this table benefited from this woman?
translation.ko: 여기 계신 분 중에 최근 이 여자한테 뭐라도 받은 분?

translation.en: Huh? Answer. Raise hands. Apostle? Huh?
Otunba, sir?
You? But she wants to come back here and share from our hustle again.
translation.ko: 그쪽은? 상황이 이런데도 우리한테 내놓으라고 하잖아요

translation.en: She wants to be king at this table.
[in Yoruba] Mama, your era has passed. Drop the mantle.
translation.ko: 마마, 당신의 시대는 지나갔어요 이제 내려놔요

translation.en: [in English] Release the crown.
Jesus of Nazareth!
Apostle, that is not from Jesus...
translation.ko: 아포스틀레 이건 신이 준 게 아니에요

translation.en: or your king.
It's from Makanaki.
And Odogwu Malay.
-Tell them the facts. -Facts.
Well... [clears throat] Um, what is done is done.
translation.ko: 그게... 이미 일어난 일은 돌이킬 수 없으니까

translation.en: Mummy, we cannot reverse what has been done.
translation.ko: 마마, 이미 엎질러진 물은 담을 수 없어요

translation.en: But I'm glad that Makanaki respects our rules
enough to make sure the king has her share.
No, no. Everybody at this table has an equal share. Who's a king?
translation.ko: 아뇨, 아닙니다 모두에게 똑같이 나눴죠 누가 킹입니까?

translation.en: Maki! Her cut is 40, after everything else.
[in Yoruba] She's not my king.
[in English] She's not my king.
[in Yoruba] They say a child doesn't recognize a deadly herb,
so he calls it a vegetable.
The elders spoke that proverb.
Little ones, where were you when I started?
translation.ko: 너희들, 내가 시작했을 때 어디 있었지?

translation.en: Look at me, Akorede.
[in English] Sitting in this chair as the head of this table...
translation.ko: 내가 이 원탁에 앉아서 킹 노릇을 할 수 있는 건

translation.en: It's not by mistake.
Your weak, late uncle,
who you inherited that seat from should have told you.
translation.ko: 너한테 그 자리를 물려준 사람 얘기는 들었겠지

translation.en: No worries.
[in Yoruba] The whip that was used for the first wife
is available for the second wife.
It seems that that crown on your head is starting to drive you crazy.
translation.ko: 왕관 무게 때문에 미쳐가는 거 같네요

translation.en: Makanaki, is something wrong with you?
[in English] What sort of insult is that?
If you cannot respect the crown, respect her age.
[in Pidgin] Your blood's too hot. Calm down.
Yorubas say:
[in Yoruba] "May God deliver us from evil."
You thought that prayer was about sickness?
translation.ko: 이게 병에 대한 기도인 것 같니?

translation.en: Disease? Or death?
That prayer was about me.
I am evil incarnate.
God's worst punishment in a person!
-And when I rain... -No, no, no, Eniola, no!
[in Yoruba] They say, one's child cannot be so bad
translation.ko: 아무리 그래도 사자에게 제물로 바칠 정도로

translation.en: that he is offered to the Lion as food.
And? You think am afraid of God?
[in Pidgin] Keep quiet.
Why do you talk like this? You don't fear God?
translation.ko: 왜 그런 말을 해? 신이 무섭지 않단 말이냐?

translation.en: Don't you know that God sees everything that's happening here? You will upset Him.
translation.ko: 신은 지금 일어나는 모든 일을 알고 있어, 너 때문에 분노할 거다

translation.en: Only God can settle all these problems going on here.
translation.ko: 신만이 이 모든 문제를 해결할 수 있어

translation.en: What is wrong with you?
That is the problem.
Any small thing: "God, God, God."
You are all afraid of a God you have never seen.
translation.ko: 평생 보지도 못한 신을 두려워하고 있잖아요

translation.en: [in Pidgin] You really should fear me as I sit here, but you don't.
translation.ko: 내가 여기 앉아 있으니 날 두려워해야 하는데 안 그러고

translation.en: Hmm?
[in Yoruba] If only you could see inside me,
you would know how dark my heart is.
translation.ko: 내 내면이 얼마나 어두운지 알 수 있겠죠

translation.en: -Akorede. -Hmm?
-You want my crown? -Yes.
Stand up. Come and collect it.
[in Yoruba] You'll realize that the teeth a dog uses to play with her puppies
translation.ko: 어미 개가 새끼개를 데리고 놀 때 쓰는 이빨을

translation.en: are the same teeth she uses to discipline them.
translation.ko: 훈육할 때도 쓰는 걸 알게 되겠지

translation.en: Mama, you like to speak in parables? Let me give you one.
translation.ko: 우화를 좋아하시나 봐요? 저도 하나 들려드리죠

translation.en: [in Yoruba] A tree that cannot support us when we rest on it
cannot kill us if it falls on us.
Korede, stop there!
Look at me.
[in English] I swear, in front of everybody here today,
including the man of God...
that I, Eniola Salami,
will stretch my hands over your dead body.
[in Yoruba] It's Makanaki! My name is Makanaki.
-Mr. Apata. -Mr. Gobir.
Yes, good day.
Yes, any new offers on the house yet?
Mr. Gobir, these things don't happen overnight.
translation.ko: 고비르, 이런 건 하루아침에 이뤄지지 않아요

translation.en: You gave us strict instructions,
unless you'd like us to entertain offers below your asking price.
That's okay.
Give it some more time. Mr. Apata, I'll call you back.
translation.ko: 좀 더 있어 보죠 아파타 씨, 다시 전화 드릴게요

translation.en: Hi.
It's okay, they are fine.
They are with my sister. You need to rest now.
translation.ko: 누나가 봐주고 있어 지금은 일단 푹 쉬어

translation.en: ♪ Come and be victorious Lord Jesus Christ ♪
♪ For your servants ♪
♪ In the midst of all our enemies ♪
♪ Father, come and be victorious ♪
♪ Come and be victorious Lord Jesus Christ ♪
♪ For your servants ♪
♪ In the midst of all our enemies ♪
♪ Father, come and be victorious ♪
♪ The father is victorious ♪
♪ The son is victorious ♪
♪ The Holy Spirit is victorious ♪
You accepted the sacrifice of Olugbon and he became victorious.
You accepted the sacrifice of Aresha and he also became successful.
You are the one that accepted the sacrifice of Onikoyi.
That is how Onikoyi became a powerful person.
translation.ko: 그리하여 오니코이가 강력한 힘을 갖게 해주소서

translation.en: We reverence you, Great Mother!
Akorede, oh!
Korede, oh!
You have no understanding! You have no understanding, Akorede!
translation.ko: 넌 아무것도 몰라 쥐뿔도 모른다고, 아코레데!

translation.en: It is said that the flood is always determined to wash away the house,
translation.ko: 이런 말이 있지 홍수는 모든 집을 쓸어간다고

translation.en: but the owner must be ready to prevent it. That is so!
translation.ko: 집주인은 그걸 막을 준비가 돼 있지, 그게 세상의 이치

translation.en: A dog that challenges a lion is definitely ready to die.
That is so!
A butterfly that challenges a thorn head-on
will surely have wings and beauty torn to shreds.
translation.ko: 그 아름다운 날개가 갈기갈기 찢어지게 마련이지

translation.en: Open your mouth and say exactly what you want here today.
translation.ko: 이제 본인이 바라는 걸 정확히 말하시오

translation.en: The crown is the identity of a king.
Beads are the identity of a chief.
I want the crown on Eniola's head.
translation.ko: 난 왕관과 에니올라의 머리를 갖고 싶습니다

translation.en: -Give me the crown! -Korede, oh!
-Give me the crown! -Korede, oh!
-Give me the crown! -I will clear a path with your back.
translation.ko: - 왕관을 주세요! - 네놈 등짝으로 길을 청소해주지

translation.en: -Give me the crown! -I will drag you through the bushes!
translation.ko: - 왕관을 주세요 - 숲으로 질질 끌고 다니겠어

translation.en: -Give me the crown! -I will drag you through the bushes.
translation.ko: - 왕관을 주세요 - 숲으로 질질 끌고 다니겠어

translation.en: Give me the crown!
-Give me the crown! -I will clear a path with your back.
translation.ko: - 왕관을 주세요 - 네놈 등짝으로 길을 청소해주지

translation.en: -Give me the crown! -Akorede oh!
-Give me the crown! -I will clear a path with your back!
[scoffs] Ah, sir.
With all these?
Murder, election manipulation, money laundering?
Very. But nothing has been able to stick until now.
translation.ko: 맞아, 근데 아직까지 확실한 증거는 없어

translation.en: Look, this woman is as slippery as an eel. Too many government connects.
translation.ko: 이 여자는 교묘하게 빠져나가 정치 쪽에 연줄도 많고

translation.en: But I know how to get her. Look at the finances.
translation.ko: 그래도 다 잡는 방법이 있어 장부를 봐봐

translation.en: All these verified, sir?
Look, she's been laundering a lot of money through these businesses.
translation.ko: 봐, 이런 사업을 통해서 엄청난 돈을 빼돌렸어

translation.en: We received a reliable tip
that she is the mastermind
behind the string of recent political robberies.
translation.ko: 이번에 시끄러웠던 정치 쪽 도난 건 있잖아

translation.en: Her targets can't go to the police and report
because these are stolen funds.
So she is making out like a bandit.
But, sir, these people. Aren't they her political cronies?
translation.ko: 근데 이 피해자들은 이 여자의 정치 쪽 연줄 아닌가요?

translation.en: [in Hausa] Yeah, No honor amongst thieves, I guess.
You are right.
Look, I want you on this immediately.
But, sir, we are still on the Ebele case and--
translation.ko: 근데 지금은 에벨레 수사가 한참 진행 중이라...

translation.en: I know, but this has been pushed up by the powers above.
translation.ko: 알아, 근데 윗선에서 이 건부터 해결하라고 난리야

translation.en: We must get her immediately.
[in Hausa] Got it?
Yes, sir.
Uh, Gobir.
-Yes, sir. -I want you to be careful.
[in Hausa] She is a terrible person.
She can be very dangerous.
[Gobir] How dangerous can she be?
[Eniola in Yoruba] God, I'm begging you.
Don't bring tears to my eyes and pain to my body.
translation.ko: 제 눈에 눈물 나지 않게 하시고 고통받지 않게 하소서

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Kitan, what is it? What have I done to you, this child?
translation.ko: 키탄, 왜 그러니? 내가 너한테 뭘 했길래?

translation.en: Where do I turn to? Where do I turn to?
Mum, please, can you sit down?
Your constant pacing will drill a hole in this floor.
translation.ko: 계속 그러고 돌아다니다 땅 파고 들어가겠다

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Leave me alone! What is wrong with you?
Stop it!
All I'm saying is calm down or you'll give yourself high blood pressure.
translation.ko: 앉으라고 한마디 한 건데 왜 그렇게 열을 내요?

translation.en: -High blood pressure? -He's fine.
I've told you that he and Tiger are on the way back.
Right. Thank you!
[in Yoruba] Thank you, God. I will worship you.
Thank you, creator of heaven and earth.
Kitan, my dear, what's wrong with you?
translation.ko: 키탄, 우리 아들 대체 어떻게 된 거야?

translation.en: Look at my life!
Kitan, a worried parent will always say to the child, "Child, don't kill me."
translation.ko: 걱정하는 부모는 자식한테 이러지 '이러다 나 죽겠다'

translation.en: -"Child, don't kill me." -Mummy.
But you'll push me to the point where I say, "Child, don't kill yourself."
translation.ko: 근데 난 어떤 지경이었는지 알아? '무사하기만 해라'

translation.en: What's wrong with you?
Mummy, you don't know what I went through.
Do you ever think of your family before you do the stupid things you do?
translation.ko: 어리석은 짓을 하기 전에 가족을 한 번이라도 생각해

translation.en: [Kitan] Mum, please. I'm not in the mood for this girl right now.
translation.ko: 엄마, 지금은 누나랑 얘기할 기분 아니에요

translation.en: [in Yoruba] You must have hit your head on the steering wheel in that car crash.
You're not in the mood?
But you were in the mood to drive piss drunk and total an entire car?
translation.ko: 근데 존나 취해서 음주운전은 하고 싶었나 봐?

translation.en: -[in Yoruba] Kemi, please. -What if you killed someone?
-That's enough. -Eh?
I'm tired of this girl. Stupid bitch.
[in Yoruba] Who is a bitch? You must be stupid. You?
-My life! -Mummy!
In my presence!
Do I look like a bag of salt? Right in my presence!
Calling your older sister what?
You are hitting me because of her? Because of this one?
translation.ko: 누나 때문에 날 때리다니 이 여자 때문에?

translation.en: "Because of her?"
Who do you think bailed you out and kept your stupidity out of the press?
translation.ko: 누가 보석금 내주고 기사 막아준 거 같아?

translation.en: -Do your job! Do your job. -Do my job?
-[in Yoruba] That's enough. -You know what? I blame you.
-Me? -You baby him and you spoil him
and that's why he walks around with this stupid sense of entitlement!
translation.ko: 그러니까 특권 의식 가지고 싸돌아다니는 거라고요

translation.en: That's enough, please.
-Entitlement? -Yes!
If anybody should be entitled here...
-Stop! -...who should be entitled? You.
-Kitan! -At least I am not actively trying
to bring shame onto this family!
translation.ko: 가족 이름에 먹칠하는 짓은 안 해

translation.en: Kemi. That's enough, please.
I am tired of letting him get away with everything because "KT is sensitive."
translation.ko: 무슨 사고를 쳐도 예민하다며 빠져나가는 거 진저리나요

translation.en: Don't say that.
He does absolutely nothing but spend money all day!
translation.ko: 종일 돈 쓰고 돌아다니기밖에 더 해요?

translation.en: Adds nothing to this family!
And after almost ruining his life in England,
he comes back here to pick up where he left off!
translation.ko: 여기 와서 또 한량 짓 하잖아요

translation.en: -He'll never change! -That's enough!
translation.ko: - 절대 안 바뀔 거예요 - 이제 됐어

translation.en: Mummy, I'm doing my best to be calm. Am I not your son?
translation.ko: 엄마, 나 엄청 참고 있는 거 알죠 난 아들 아니에요?

translation.en: Should she be talking to me like this? Am I not your son? That's enough!
translation.ko: 나한테 저딴 식으로 말하다니 나도 엄마 아들이에요

translation.en: -Wait. -Son? Kitan...
I am more of a son than you will ever be.
translation.ko: 네가 평생 노력해봐야 내가 아들 노릇 하는 것만 못해

translation.en: -Don't say that! -What do you want to do?
-Stop! -What?
[in Yoruba] Don't ever say that! It's enough! Don't ever say that!
translation.ko: 그런 말은 절대 하지 마! 이제 됐어, 하지 마

translation.en: What is the matter with you? Don't ever repeat that in this house!
translation.ko: 대체 왜 그래? 이 집에서 그딴 말 입에 담지 마!

translation.en: -I blame you. -Blame me for what?
-I blame you. -You cannot blame me!
You are to blame for everything. You treat him like a two-year-old.
translation.ko: 다 엄마 탓이에요 애 취급하니 쟤가 저 모양이죠

translation.en: Alhaja...
Look, I remember how you helped my son
translation.ko: 자매님이 우리 아들 도와준 거 기억합니다

translation.en: with that unfortunate incident,
so I agreed to this meeting out of respect.
translation.ko: 이 자리에 나온 것도 당신을 존경하기 때문이죠

translation.en: But honestly, I do not know how I can be of help.
translation.ko: 근데 솔직히 제가 어떻게 도와야 할지 모르겠습니다

translation.en: That's the problem.
Because everyone seems to have forgotten all the good things I have done for them.
translation.ko: 다들 내가 어려울 때 도와준 걸 까먹은 모양이더군요

translation.en: See, that is the kind of talk that has landed you where you are now, Eniola.
translation.ko: 그게 지금 본인의 위치를 알려주는 얘기예요, 에니올라

translation.en: What kind of talk, Senator Okon? What kind of talk?
translation.ko: 무슨 얘기요, 오콘 상원의원? 뭔 소리예요?

translation.en: Huh? Because I insisted on what was promised to me?
[Okon] Yes.
See, I don't know how this works where you come from.
translation.ko: 자매님 있는 데는 어떻게 돌아가는지 모르겠지만

translation.en: But, Eniola, you have played politics long enough to know
translation.ko: 오래 했으니 여기 정치판 뻔한 거 알 때도 됐잖아요

translation.en: that there are no certainties in this game.
And these threats and raids--
I had nothing to do with this. Absolutely nothing.
As far as everyone is concerned, you have drawn the battle line.
You have made yourself a liability.
A dangerous one.
Number One is far from happy.
I tried calling him.
I tried calling him to explain things to him.
He is not taking my calls. Nobody is taking my calls.
translation.ko: 근데 전화를 안 받고 아무도 내 전화를 안 받아요

translation.en: Everyone shut me out completely, despite everything I've done for them.
Of course! You have stepped on the tail of the tiger.
translation.ko: 당연하죠, 지금 호랑이 코털을 건드린 거예요

translation.en: And I'm afraid what he might do.
I need to see him.
Can you arrange a meeting?
Eniola, I could be in trouble just being seen with you.
translation.ko: 에니올라, 당신과 같이 있는 게 목격되기만 해도 곤란해져요

translation.en: Not to mention telling you all this.
translation.ko: 이런 얘기를 한 건 말할 것도 없고요

translation.en: I have to go.
Good luck.
Where are they?
Open the gate for them!
Come on, open the gate! We have nothing to hide!
translation.ko: 어서, 문 열어줘 우린 숨기는 거 없어

translation.en: -Good morning, madam. -Yes?
I can't read it.
It's an official letter inviting you in, ma.
[chuckling] Inviting me? What's going on? You're throwing a party?
translation.ko: 날 초대한다고? 무슨 일이죠? 그쪽이 파티라도 열어요?

translation.en: -For questioning, madam. -Today?
Right now.
Questioning for what?
You will find out when you get to the office.
Don't worry.
Give me few minutes to change and I'll be with you.
-That's fine. -Just stay there please. There.
Mum, let's just go, please. You want to change, let's change.
translation.ko: 엄마, 그냥 가요 옷 갈아입고 와요

translation.en: [Gobir] Good morning, Mrs. Salami. Pleasure to finally meet you.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요 살라미 부인 드디어 만나네요, 반가워요

translation.en: The pleasure is all mine.
My daughter.
Kemi Salami. I'll be acting as her legal counsel.
Congratulations on your new appointment.
Although the man before you happens to be my very good friend.
I'm sure you are going to do great in this new appointment of yours.
Of course, Mrs. Salami. Thank you.
You're welcome.
Well, I would not like to insult you by beating around the bush.
translation.ko: 질질 돌려서 말하는 건 실례인 것 같아서요

translation.en: Do you mind if we go straight to the point?
-Oh, please. -Great.
Well, first of all I must thank you for coming on such short notice.
Well, she didn't have a choice.
Your men barricaded our house like she was a criminal.
Sorry to hear that.
I must speak to my people on better procedure next time.
Mr. Gobir, you invited me, and here I am.
translation.ko: 고비르, 당신이 초대해서 제가 온 거예요

translation.en: I have nothing to hide.
Well, we are working on a tip from a very reliable source,
that you are involved in, uh...
Yes. Money laundering, drug and weapon smuggling.
translation.ko: 그래, 돈세탁과 약물, 무기 밀반입 혐의가 있다고 합니다

translation.en: Surely, you did not bring my mother here on hearsay.
translation.ko: 그냥 들은 것만으로 저희 어머니를 부른 건 아니겠죠?

translation.en: And who is this "reliable source" feeding you these tips?
translation.ko: 그리고 신뢰할 만한 정보원은 대체 누구죠?

translation.en: Ms. Salami, with all due respect, you know I cannot tell you that.
translation.ko: 살라미 씨, 죄송하지만 그건 알려드릴 수 없습니다

translation.en: Well, those tips are simply unfounded.
My mother is a very hardworking woman
with multiple legitimate businesses to her name.
Does she look like someone that smuggles drugs or weapons?
Thank you for bringing that up.
That's actually why we invited you all here.
translation.ko: 사실 그래서 저희가 부인을 부른 거예요

translation.en: You see, our investigation uncovered that you use these businesses to launder money.
translation.ko: 저희가 조사한 바로는 부인이 사업을 돈세탁에 이용했고

translation.en: And we also uncovered that you have multiple high-end properties
translation.ko: 고급 아파트 여러 채를 갖고 있다고 밝혀졌어요

translation.en: under the name of... Kachi Nwachukwu,
who, until recently, was your domestic help.
translation.ko: 최근까지 부인 집에서 일하던 가정부 이름이죠

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Ma'am, I'm not sure how well you pay,
translation.ko: 부인 그쪽이 얼마나 잘 버는진 모르겠지만

translation.en: but with two high rises in Ikoyi and one in VI...
translation.ko: 물가 비싼 이코이랑 VI에 두 채나

translation.en: And then, you have to explain the source of all that money
translation.ko: 그 돈이 어디에서 나왔는지 출처를 설명해주세요

translation.en: scattered in your bank accounts.
translation.ko: 은행 계좌에 분산 시켜 놓은 돈요

translation.en: I'm not sure that would be gotten from the sale of lace and bread?
translation.ko: 레이스나 빵을 팔아서 그 돈을 번 건 아닐 테고

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
No, I'm saying she doesn't pay enough tax for that to be so.
translation.ko: 버는 거에 비하면 세금을 조금 낸 것 같단 겁니다

translation.en: Wait, you have her account information?
translation.ko: 잠깐만요, 엄마 계좌 정보를 알고 있어요?

translation.en: Surely that's gross infringement of privacy, at least.
Ms. Salami, I assure you we have legal jurisdiction.
You are allowed to be in this meeting simply out of courtesy.
translation.ko: 당신은 그냥 이 자리에 예의상 있는 거예요

translation.en: Your mother here does not need a lawyer, neither does she need a mouthpiece.
translation.ko: 어머님은 변호사도 필요 없고 입 다물고 있을 필요도 없어요

translation.en: It's just a simple questioning. I mean, it's just a mere conversation.
So, I'll suggest that you allow her to speak for herself.
translation.ko: 그러니 어머님이 말씀하실 기회를 드리는 게 좋겠군요

translation.en: That's all right.
As she said, I have loads of businesses.
A few fabric shops,
bakeries where I make my sweet, beautiful Agege bread
translation.ko: 달콤하고 맛있는 아게게 빵을 만드는 빵 가게도 있고

translation.en: two water bottling companies, other--
And if you gave us time, we would have brought
the necessary documents needed to answer your questions in this regard.
translation.ko: 그쪽에 궁금해하는 서류를 챙겨올 수 있었을 거예요

translation.en: As for the properties owned by Kachi,
she's worked with my mother since I was, what-- six years old?
translation.ko: 그분이 엄마랑 일한 게 내가 6살 때부터였을 거예요

translation.en: -But we haven't seen her in... two years? -Yeah, two years.
translation.ko: - 근데 못 본 지 2년 됐나? - 맞아, 2년

translation.en: Two years.
So unless you can tie us to these buildings,
translation.ko: 이 자리에서 대답할 만한 거면 몰라도

translation.en: I find this course of questioning disrespectful and completely out of order.
[in Pidgin] Guy, why did you get a car with a broken radio?
translation.ko: 라디오 고장 난 차는 뭐 하러 산 거야?

translation.en: Turn down the volume. Turn it down.
Call Tiger now.
-His phone is switched off. -Call him again. Call him again, fast.
-Mr. Gobir? -Yes.
You didn't have to walk me out, you know.
It's my pleasure.
-Please. -Oh, thank you.
Needless to say, you must let us know before any international travel.
translation.ko: 아시겠지만 해외여행 갈 거면 미리 알려주셔야 합니다

translation.en: [laughs] Like I said earlier, I have nothing to hide, so I'm not running.
translation.ko: 아까도 말했듯이 숨기는 거 없어요 도망 안 가요

translation.en: Thank you once again and have a lovely evening.
[Tiger] Hello?
-Hmm. -Mom, are you okay?
King, Musa and Tango have got the package cornered.
Should they take it out?
Stop.
[sighs] The ground is very, very hot.
It's because of Gobir's interference.
-Ade, Tiger. -Yes, ma.
Keep eyes on him for now.
Boys, stand down.
Yes, boss. Yeah. Okay.
-Kemi. -Mum.
Get a gift to Mr. Gobir to apologize for his inconvenience.
translation.ko: 고비르 줄 선물 준비해 불편하게 해서 미안하다고

translation.en: How much of an inconvenience are we talking?
A very big inconvenience.
Yeah, it's me. I need you to handle something for me immediately.
translation.ko: 나야, 급하게 처리해야 할 일이 있어

translation.en: [in Hausa] Lord have mercy!
Hello?
[distorted voice] I see you got our gift.
Who is this?
It's a hand of friendship from Alhaja Salami.
translation.ko: 알하자 살라미가 친해지고 싶다고 보낸 선물이지

translation.en: What if I refuse the gift?
Trust me, sir.
You would rather be friends with the Alhaja than her enemy.
translation.ko: 알하자를 친구로 두는 게 적으로 두는 것보다 훨씬 나아

translation.en: Is that a threat?
Ah, Mr. Gobir. When did $500,000 in cash become a threat?
I'm going to die, aren't I?
Don't say that!
[in Hausa] Don't talk like this, Hauwa. That will never happen. God forbid.
translation.ko: 그렇게 말하지 마, 하우와 그럴 일 없어, 신이 허락 안 해

translation.en: Come. God forbid. Come. Come.
[news anchor] Good evening, I am Sade Bello.
-[sirens blaring] -KAVTV can now confirm
that political ally and socialite Alhaja Eniola Salami
translation.ko: 정치 활동가이자 사교계 유명인 알하자 에니올라 살라미 씨가

translation.en: has been arrested this evening by state officials
on suspicion of murder, money laundering,
diversion of state funds, bribing a state agent.
It has been confirmed that she has been taken into custody
to an undisclosed location.
I demand to be let in to see my mother.
translation.ko: 엄마를 보러 갈 수 있게 들여 보내주세요

translation.en: Madam, you cannot demand anything here.
I'm her lawyer.
Madam, you cannot see her now. She is going through booking and--
translation.ko: 지금은 면회가 안 돼요 지금 경위서를 쓰고...

translation.en: What? So, you intend to keep her here overnight?
translation.ko: 뭐요? 그럼 엄마가 여기서 밤새 있어야 한단 거예요?

translation.en: -Madam. -[Gobir] Ms. Salami.
-Sir! -You see, there is no need
to get overexcited.
You will see your mum as soon as she is booked and processed.
translation.ko: 어머님이 경위서를 다 쓰면 바로 만날 수 있어요

translation.en: So you are keeping her here overnight?
translation.ko: 그럼 엄마가 여기서 밤새 있어야 하나요?

translation.en: Yes, hopefully. And every other night until trial.
translation.ko: 맞아요, 그리고 재판까지 이틀에 한 번씩요

translation.en: On what charges?
Okay. There you go.
[scoffs] You can't prove any of this.
[whispers] Can I have this, please?
Shit.
[in Yoruba] Eni, you will hurt me.
Good girl.
Why would I be dealing with a bloody servant when he has a king?
-I salute you, boss. -Yes, yes?
-We have a small big problem. -What are you saying?
translation.ko: - 조그만데 큰 문제가 터졌어요 - 뭔 소리야?

translation.en: Alhaji, I'll be on my way.
Say what you have to say and stop bothering me. Can't you see I'm--
translation.ko: 빨리 할 말 하고 가 지금 우리 안 보이냐?

translation.en: Alaaru was arrested just before he boarded the plane.
How? But we have people in there.
Someone snitched on him.
Have you reached out to our people in there
to see if there is anything they can do?
It's too late. He has been detained.
-Has he mentioned my name? -Not yet, sir.
Hurry up!
Reach out to our people on the inside so they can handle the situation.
translation.ko: 내부에 깔아놓은 우리 애들한테 손 좀 쓰라고 해

translation.en: -Do you understand me? -Yes, sir.
You understand?
Go and do something about it!
But if we don't deliver the package tonight, sir,
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에 소포 배달 못 하면

translation.en: we will lose our contact in London.
Ah, that's a problem.
That's a problem.
Don't worry about that. I will take it for you.
I said I'll take it for you.
My love, let me do this for you. I can carry it for you. You can trust me.
translation.ko: 자기야, 내가 할게 자기를 위해서 하고 싶어, 날 믿어

translation.en: [Kemi] Mummy. Mummy.
I was told I could confer with my client.
translation.ko: 고객과 단둘이 있을 수 있다고 들었어요

translation.en: Alone!
[guard] Ten minutes.
Mummy, are they treating you well?
Kemi, they are closing in on me. All of them.
translation.ko: 케미, 다들 나한테 등 돌리고 있어 전부 다

translation.en: [in Yoruba] They can smell blood.
They want to get me.
Mummy, don't talk like that.
You can't let them see you like this. Defeated.
translation.ko: 저들에게 이런 모습을 보이면 안 돼요 패자의 모습

translation.en: You are King.
The King.
Get me out.
I will. I'll get you out.
Don't cry. Don't let them see you cry.
translation.ko: 울지 마세요 우는 모습 절대 보이지 마세요

translation.en: Hello, sir.
[man] Gobir, well done. The entire department is so proud of you.
translation.ko: 고비르, 아주 잘했어 전 부서가 자랑스러워하고 있네

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
Make sure that woman doesn't get bail, though.
translation.ko: 그 여자가 보석금 내고 풀려나지 못하게 막아

translation.en: Of course, sir. I'm on it, sir.
And also make sure your case is airtight
translation.ko: 물샐 틈 없이 단단히 처신해야 해

translation.en: because that woman is as slippery as an eel, and extremely dangerous.
translation.ko: 능구렁이같이 잘 빠져나가는 데다 아주 위험하거든

translation.en: Yes, sir. Sure.
Good. Uh, Gobir?
Yes, sir?
Can I ask you a personal question?
[in Hausa] Yes, go ahead, sir.
The money.
I mean, weren't you even tempted at all?
Of course I was, sir.
[in Hausa] But if I had taken it, I would have become one of them.
translation.ko: 하지만 이걸 받으면 난 그들처럼 되는 거잖아요

translation.en: And that is something my conscience cannot live with.
I have even more respect for you now. Thank you very much, Gobir.
-Bye. -Thank you, sir.
-[laughing] -[in Yoruba] Me? With which guy?
That guy that walks around running his mouth.
I was just staring at him, wondering if he was talking to me.
translation.ko: 계속 쳐다보고 있었어 나한테도 말하는 거 아닌가 싶어서

translation.en: Lord have mercy.
Eni-Baby.
You intoxicate me like alcohol all the time.
I wish I met you when I was young.
-You would have recognized! -Alhaji, you still have it now.
translation.ko: - 나한테 더 빠졌을 텐데 - 지금도 충분해

translation.en: That's not true. There's a huge difference.
You would have enjoyed me the way the white man enjoys cigars.
translation.ko: 백인들이 시가 좋아 죽는 것처럼 나한테 빠졌을 거야

translation.en: That would have been too much.
My good lover. My sweet lover. My darling lover.
translation.ko: 우리 자기, 예쁜 자기 귀여운 자기

translation.en: Eni, Eni.
You make me happy all the time.
But I've asked you to marry me and you have refused.
translation.ko: 근데 내가 결혼하자고 했을 때 거절했지

translation.en: What is wrong? Marry me.
Eni, listen. Why do you keep punishing me like this all the time?
translation.ko: 에니, 대체 왜 이런 식으로 항상 나한테 벌주는 거야?

translation.en: I am asking you to marry me. What is wrong with you? Eni.
Don't you already have a wife? Yes or no?
So? What does that have to do with anything?
Look, I can marry up to four wives.
Oh, so you want to marry four wives?
-No. -That's what you're saying.
Don't misunderstand me, young lady.
Look, I want you. It's you I want.
translation.ko: 난 너만 있으면 돼 내가 원하는 건 너라고

translation.en: Eni. Eni.
Alhaji.
You know I would do anything for you in this life.
translation.ko: 내가 자기를 위해 모든 걸 다 할 거란 거 알지?

translation.en: Any bloody thing, I would do it.
But me?
I will never be a second wife.
Eni, Eni!
What's wrong with this girl?
[clicks tongue] I don't know why she's not picking up her calls.
Must be the network. Would you like to try my number?
translation.ko: 신호가 잘 안 잡히나 보지 내 걸로 해볼래?

translation.en: Yeah.
Code.
Tiger, please give me 15 minutes, I'll be right down.
Where have you been?
Why haven't you been picking up my calls? I've been trying to reach you all day.
translation.ko: 왜 내 전화 안 받아? 종일 전화했는데

translation.en: Kitan, not now please. I'm exhausted.
translation.ko: 키탄, 나중에 얘기해 지금 너무 힘들어

translation.en: I've been at the holding cell all day trying to make bail.
translation.ko: 보석 받으려고 종일 감방에 있었단 말이야

translation.en: [Kitan] When is she coming out?
I'm doing everything I can, but they're intent on keeping her.
translation.ko: 최선을 다하고 있어 근데 계속 잡아두려고 하더라

translation.en: I mean they don't even want to discuss bail
and all our political contacts are distancing...
translation.ko: 그리고 정치 쪽 연줄들은 다 거리를 두고...

translation.en: Hello. You must be so tired. Is there anything I can do to help?
[Kitan] This is my girlfriend, Amaka.
Amaka, Kemi. My...
The one I told you about.
Oh, hi!
Amaka is a lawyer as well.
So, I have been trying to get her up to speed on everything that's going on.
translation.ko: 이 친구한테 무슨 일이 있었는지 얘기해줬어

translation.en: So, what I want you guys to do is sit down and strategize,
translation.ko: 그러니까 둘이 같이 의논하고 전략을 짜서

translation.en: so we can try to come up with a solution to this whole thing.
translation.ko: 이 문제에 대한 해결책을 찾으면 될 것 같아

translation.en: All right?
[Kemi] So what you are telling me is that...
Wait, Kitan.
So, you discussed private family business with an outsider, huh?
translation.ko: 사적인 가족 문제를 외부 사람한테 얘기했단 거네?

translation.en: Kitan...
if you think for a second that I'm going to sit down and talk strategy
translation.ko: 네가 원하는 대로 내가 전략을 짤 거로 생각한 거야?

translation.en: with one of your whores--
Hey, there's no need for all that.
You're even more clueless than I've given you credit for.
translation.ko: 내가 알던 것보다 훨씬 등신 같구나

translation.en: [Amaka] My darling...
You know what, I think I should go.
No. This is my mother's house.
If anyone is going to leave, she is welcome to.
What's all this attitude? Is it not you I'm talking to?
translation.ko: 태도가 왜 그따위야? 내가 말한 게 누나거든?

translation.en: -Kemi. -Kitan, babe. Babe, calm down.
-This is the rubbish I have to deal. -[Amaka] I know.
-[in Yoruba] Good afternoon. -Welcome.
-Is this Kemi? -Yes, it's her.
She's all grown up.
Kem-Kem.
Bunmi... Bunmi.
-Bunmi. -[in Yoruba] Oh, Eni-Baby. You came.
Of course.
I dashed here as soon as I heard.
It's been a long time.
[Bunmi] You look so good.
I'm so glad you got out of that place early.
I can see that life has been kinder to you.
-Look at my Eni-Baby. -How are you?
How are you doing?
Sometimes bad,
sometimes worse.
Today is bad. So I thank God.
translation.ko: 오늘은 좀 안 좋네 그나마 다행이야

translation.en: Look. See, I am going to take you to a hospital that is very, very good.
translation.ko: 있잖아, 내가 진짜 완전 좋은 병원으로 데려갈게

translation.en: [in Yoruba] A hospital where they know what they're doing.
Do you understand? Don't worry.
I just need one favor from you.
Name anything.
No. No.
Look, you're going to get better and take care of your child by yourself.
[in Yoruba] You hear me? By the grace of God,
you will get better and you will take care of her by yourself.
translation.ko: 넌 다 나아서 애들도 스스로 돌보게 될 거야

translation.en: That's exactly what will happen.
No, I will not.
It's already too late. There is no cure for this thing.
translation.ko: 이미 너무 늦었어 치료할 수가 없어

translation.en: Don't talk like that.
[in Yoruba] What do these people know?
They don't know anything. What do they know?
All they are looking for is money.
Let me tell you something.
Chief knows every doctor. There is no doctor...
[in Yoruba] Look, we will fly them in.
We will fly them in. Do you understand?
I just want you to take care of Kemi for me.
There is no other person on this earth I can trust more.
translation.ko: 이 세상에 내가 믿을 사람은 너뿐이야

translation.en: I don't want her to grow up in my environment.
translation.ko: 쟤가 나 같은 환경에서 자라는 건 싫어

translation.en: That dirty world we grew up in.
Please help me give her a better life.
translation.ko: 쟤가 더 나은 인생을 살 수 있게 꼭 도와줘

translation.en: A life I can never give her, but you now can.
translation.ko: 난 해줄 수 없지만 넌 가능하잖아

translation.en: I promise.
I promise.
Tiger.
I need you to do something very important for me.
-[knocking at door] -Come in.
[woman] Just wanted to make sure you were ready, sir.
Yes, I am. Do you have all the files with you?
translation.ko: 다 됐어 파일은 다 갖고 있나?

translation.en: They are right here with me, sir.
-Oh, good. So let's go then. -All right, sir.
-I'll meet you downstairs. -All right, sir.
Look, honey, I really don't have the time to talk now.
I'm on the way to the court.
[man] That's exactly why we must talk now.
Who is this and what are doing with my wife's phone?
translation.ko: 누구야? 우리 집사람 핸드폰으로 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: -[crying] -You, talk to your husband.
Honey, please help us.
-Do whatever they tell you. -[men shouting]
Please. That's my entire family. Please.
Don't hurt any one of them.
I don't want to.
But if you don't want me to send you their body parts one after the other,
translation.ko: 훼손된 가족들 신체 부위를 받기 싫다면

translation.en: you must do something for me.
[bailiff] May we all rise for The Honorable Justice Nwachukwu.
Please be seated.
I'll go right to it.
After deliberating on the evidence presented to this court,
translation.ko: 법정에 제출한 증거물을 토대로 숙고해봤을 때

translation.en: I feel the NCCC has failed to establish a direct link
between Alhaja Salami and the $500,000 bribe.
translation.ko: 50만 달러 뇌물 혐의를 입증할 수가 없습니다

translation.en: All other evidence is circumstantial at best.
Not forgetting that Alhaja Salami is a respected member of society
translation.ko: 알하자 살라미는 존경받는 이 사회의 일원이자

translation.en: with strong ties with the community.
translation.ko: 끈끈한 정을 가진 사회 활동가로 이름을 떨치고 있습니다

translation.en: With all these in mind, I have no other choice
translation.ko: 이런 것들을 다 고려해 봤을 때

translation.en: than to grant Alhaja Salami
bail without conditions.
-[gavel banging] -Silence in court!
-[gavel banging] -Silence in court!
Calm down. Calm down. Calm down. Calm down.
Loosely borrowing from the words
of the very well-respected Justice Nwachukwu,
my mother is an upstanding member of this community.
translation.ko: 저희 어머니는 존경받는 이 사회의 일원입니다

translation.en: And it is completely outrageous how she is being treated.
translation.ko: 근데 이런 취급을 받다니 정말 분노를 금할 수 없습니다

translation.en: We caution the NCCC to cease this witch-hunt of Alhaja Salami.
translation.ko: 금융범죄단속팀은 이런 마녀 사냥을 당장 멈추십시오

translation.en: Or we will have no other recourse than to seek redress in the court of law.
translation.ko: 안 그러면 법정에서 이 일의 책임을 물을 것입니다

translation.en: Hold on.
As you can tell, my mother is very tired. So no more questions,
translation.ko: 말씀드렸듯이 어머니가 지쳤으니 질문은 가급적 자제해주시고

translation.en: but you can expect a formal statement from us soon. Thank you.
[in Yoruba] How is everything now?
Oh, I don't want to hear any business talk from you.
No business talk.
Everything you're supposed to be doing, I'm handling it.
translation.ko: 자기가 할 일은 다 내가 처리하고 있어

translation.en: So don't worry about it. Our business is doing very fine.
translation.ko: 그러니 걱정하지 마 사업은 잘 굴러가고 있어

translation.en: That shouldn't be your burden to bear.
You shouldn't be doing any work in this your condition.
I am not having any condition.
I am having your son. You say I am having "condition."
translation.ko: 그런 몸이라면 당신 아들 가진 거?

translation.en: Besides, it's only till you get well.
I don't know if that will ever happen.
[in Yoruba] God forbid!
By the grace of God, you are already well.
translation.ko: 신의 은총으로 자기 이미 거의 다 나았어

translation.en: Look, in the name of Jesus...
As long as the Almighty Father that I serve is alive, you are already well.
translation.ko: 전능하신 아버지가 살아계신 한 자기는 나을 거야

translation.en: Look, you are already well, but you just don't know it yet.
I'll be mad at you. Don't ever say that.
translation.ko: 또 그런 말 하면 나 화낸다

translation.en: Eni.
I don't know how much time I still have.
And I want to see my family.
[in Yoruba] For God's sake, please.
Please, let me see them. Please.
[in Yoruba] For God's sake.
Alhaji, something has happened.
There was a very bad accident.
And in that car crash, not a single soul survived.
Eh?
I didn't know how to tell you. That was why I kept quiet about it.
translation.ko: 어떻게 말해야 할지 몰랐어 그래서 얘기를 못 했지

translation.en: Because, how do I even say that type of a thing?
translation.ko: 내가 자기한테 어떻게 그런 얘기를 하겠어?

translation.en: Eni!
Ah, Eni.
Now that we have joined you both in holy matrimony according to Islamic rites,
translation.ko: 이제 이슬람 의식에 따라 둘이 혼인을 하였으니

translation.en: and as the holy prophet Muhammad has instructed,
we will round this off with the Fatiha prayer.
-[women weeping] -[priest] Father Lord,
you wept at the death of Lazarus.
Please console those who now grieve the loss of a loved one.
translation.ko: 사랑하는 이를 잃고 비통해하는 사람들을 위로하시고

translation.en: Comfort them in the remembrance of your promises.
translation.ko: 이들이 아버지의 약속을 기억하며 편안히 쉬게 하소서

translation.en: Give those who mourn peace in the midst of tears and suffering.
translation.ko: 눈물과 고통 속에서 애도하는 이들에게 평화를

translation.en: You are the resurrection and the life.
Let those that despair find hope and consolation
translation.ko: 절망 속에서 희망과 위로를 찾게 하소서

translation.en: in Your presence and Your love.
Oh, Heavenly Father, we pray. Amen.
translation.ko: 하늘에 계신 우리 아버지 기도하나이다, 아멘

translation.en: [woman] I've been trying to-- Kitan.
Kitan.
[in Pidgin] Get this guy out of my sight!
I should have done this myself!
So Maka, how will you handle this Nwachukwu family situation?
translation.ko: 마카, 응와추큐 가족은 어떻게 할 거야?

translation.en: -Cancel them. -Yes, boss.
She died in my hands, Amaka,
my hands.
Kitan, you are drunk. And high.
How do you intend to take care of your mum like this?
It will all be okay. I promise.
Look, your mother needs you,
but you cannot go to her in this condition.
translation.ko: 근데 이런 상태로는 도와드릴 수 없잖아

translation.en: Kitan, you have to be strong.
This is the time for you to take charge
and show your mother you can lead the family.
translation.ko: 가족을 이끌어갈 수 있단 걸 증명해야 할 때야

translation.en: Have you eaten?
You need to sober up.
Let me make you some coffee.
Passcode.
What are you doing?
-Who's this, Amaka? -Why are you going through my phone?
translation.ko: - 너 뭐야, 아마카? - 내 핸드폰으로 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: I don't understand. What does this mean?
translation.ko: 이해가 안 돼 이게 무슨 뜻이야?

translation.en: You shouldn't have gone through my phone.
translation.ko: 남의 핸드폰 몰래 보는 거 아니야

translation.en: [Kitan] I thought you said you loved me.
Baby, calm down let me explain.
-You said you loved me. -I do.
You don't understand. It's not what you think. It was a mistake.
translation.ko: 자기가 몰라서 그래 자기 생각하고는 달라, 실수였어

translation.en: She was my sister!
But, Kitan, you hated her.
In an unbelievable turn in this ongoing saga,
KAVTV has just learned that Alhaja Salami
translation.ko: 방금 들어온 속보에 의하면 알하자 살라미의 외아들이

translation.en: has lost her only son to what seems to be a murder-suicide.
translation.ko: 살인 후 자살을 감행한 것으로 밝혀졌습니다

translation.en: This news just comes one day after her daughter was gunned down
translation.ko: 살라미 딸이 응와추큐 판사의 법원 앞에서

translation.en: outside Justice Nwachukwu's court by unknown assassins
translation.ko: 괴한에게 총살당한 지 하루 만에 일어난 일입니다

translation.en: seemingly gunning for Alhaja herself.
Bad news must come in threes as this comes on the heels
of NCCC freezing assets of the business mogul.
Will this be the end of the Salami empire as we have come to know it?
KAVTV has also learned that the bodies of the wife and children
translation.ko: 다음 뉴스입니다, 응와추큐 판사의 아내와 아이들 시신이

translation.en: of Justice Nwachukwu were discovered this morning
on the side of Epe road off Badagry Axis.
We are told that there are currently no suspects.
KAVTV has reached out to the police for a statement
but they have declined to comment at this time,
as investigations are still ongoing.
[in Yoruba] Leave me alone!
So that is it, my people.
We are going to re-strategize. We are going to...
translation.ko: 다시 전략을 짤 거야 다시 전략을...

translation.en: What sort of madness is this?
[in Yoruba] So because of the cat's absence,
-rats have taken possession of the house. -What?
My husband's body is not even cold in the grave
translation.ko: 우리 남편 시신이 무덤에서 채 식기도 전에

translation.en: but you've taken possession of his seat, isn't it?
Eniola.
Look, I know that Alhaji stupidly accommodated your excesses.
translation.ko: 알하지가 그쪽이 버릇없게 나와도 오냐오냐해줬던 거 알아

translation.en: But I can assure you that we won't tolerate
your stepping over your boundaries.
[in Yoruba] Never.
Okay.
Alhaji Taiwo, you are sitting in my seat. That is my seat.
translation.ko: 알하지 타이오, 그쪽이 내 자리에 앉아있어, 내 자리에

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Get up!
-Abomination! -Shut your dirty mouth.
Eniola. Eniola.
Your boldness is more than that of a dog who has walked into a lion's den.
translation.ko: 사자 굴에 들어온 개 치고 용감한 건 인정할게

translation.en: You!
Why should I be afraid of a lion that is so powerless?
You stupid woman! What are--
The taproot that stands in the way of an elephant will definitely be crushed.
translation.ko: 코끼리 가는 길을 막는 뿌리는 부러지게 마련이지

translation.en: Does anybody else have anything they want to say?
-Not at all. -No, please feel free. Speak your mind.
[in Yoruba] No. After what just happened?
It is settled.
My name is Eniola Salami, and I accept to be your leader.
translation.ko: 난 에니올라 살라미 오늘부터 여러분의 리더다

translation.en: Let us begin.
[woman] Look at you. Hmph.
[in Yoruba] Take a look at your life.
The mighty Eniola Salami.
Look what you have turned us into.
Look what you have turned us into!
You are weak. Weak!
In my time, could this have happened?
Could this have happened?
It's making my skin crawl.
It's making my skin crawl!
You have ruined everything!
You have destroyed the house that I built!
translation.ko: 내가 지금까지 이뤄온 걸 네가 다 망쳤다고!

translation.en: They will never see you for more than what you really are:
translation.ko: 네 본모습을 저들은 절대 모를 거야

translation.en: a bloody gangster.
♪ A mother is a priceless jewel ♪
translation.ko: 엄마는 값어치를 매길 수 없는 보석

translation.en: ♪ A mother is a priceless jewel ♪
translation.ko: 엄마는 값어치를 매길 수 없는 보석

translation.en: -Useless mother. -Kemi.
Why did you do this to me?
You should have protected me.
[in Yoruba] My daughter, I tried!
You should have shielded me.
You should have kept me away from this life.
-[in Yoruba] You killed me! -No! Kemi! Oh!
translation.ko: - 엄마가 날 죽인 거예요 - 아니야, 케미

translation.en: My child. My child, please.
Mummy, I want to come home.
[in Yoruba] Come home, please.
Mummy, I want to come home.
Come home, please.
I want to come home.
Come home.
-I miss you. -I want to come home.
[Bunmi in Yoruba] Don't call her Mother.
She's not your mom. A beast like her shouldn't be called so.
translation.ko: 네 엄마가 아니야 저런 괴물은 엄마가 아니야

translation.en: -Bunmi. -These ones eat their young.
translation.ko: - 번미 - 자기 자식도 먹어 치울 사람이야

translation.en: Bunmi, don't say that.
Eniola, I trusted you with my only child.

translation.en: No! It's not like that!
And this is what you do to her?
translation.ko: 근데 애한테 무슨 짓을 한 거야?

translation.en: I love Kemi. Argh! I love Kemi like my own.
translation.ko: 난 케미를 사랑해 케미를 내 딸처럼 생각한다고

translation.en: I can never hurt you!
[man in Yoruba] Shut your dirty mouth!
Nuisance.
You murdered my family in cold blood.

translation.en: [Eniola] No, no!
You put us through so much agony.
translation.ko: 너 때문에 형용할 수 없는 고통을 겪었어

It wasn't like that. It was an accident.
-[man] Accident? -Yes.
-Accident that you orchestrated yourself. -[baby crying]
For what?
Because you wanted my inheritance.
You wanted my wealth all to yourself. Isn't it?
No, it wasn't that.
Then what was it? Look at my child. My infant child.

translation.en: [Gobir] Mrs. Salami.
Mrs. Salami, can I get you some water?
translation.ko: 살라미 씨, 물 좀 갖다 드려요?

translation.en: Mrs. Salami?
Water?
I know it's a difficult day for you, and I apologize for what we--
translation.ko: 지금 힘드신 거 압니다 저희도 이런 일이 일어나 죄송...

translation.en: Do you believe in hell?
What?
Do you believe there is a hell where people pay for their sins?
translation.ko: 사람들이 죗값을 치르는 지옥이 있다고 믿냐고요?

translation.en: Yes.
I believe that there is Jahannam,

Have I been found wanting, Mr. Gobir?
Only Allah can judge that.
Allah. [scoffs]
I used to think I was a god, Mr. Gobir.
Is that blasphemy, Mr. Gobir?

translation.en: God. All I love
in this world...

And yet...
yet...
I am still here.
[in Yoruba] They say a leaf does not fall far from a tree without God's consent.
translation.ko: 나무에서 떨어지는 이파리는 신의 뜻 없이 멀리 가지 않죠

translation.en: This has become my hell

translation.ko: 내가 신인 줄 알았던 대가를 치르는 거라고요

translation.en: But she hasn't said anything worthy of mention here.
Yes, sir. She's obviously extremely traumatized.
Don't tell me you're beginning to feel sorry for her.
[snickers] Of course not, sir.
Anyway, cease all interrogations and further investigations.

translation.en: She is being transferred to another holding facility.
To face prosecution for the murder of Justice Nwachukwu's family.
translation.ko: 응와추큐 판사 가족 살인 혐의로 기소할 거라

I mean, we've been building our cases for long.
And we have jurisdiction, sir.
Look, this is above me.
The orders came from above.
[in Hausa] Who cares about a simple bribery case?
translation.ko: 누가 단순한 뇌물 사건을 신경이나 쓰겠어?

translation.en: We have her on Nwachukwu's murder case.
translation.ko: 응와추큐 가족 살인 사건이 떡하니 있는데

translation.en: Who cares about a simple bribery case?
Sir, I do!
It's more than a simple bribery case to me.
[in Hausa] It was a threat to my family and me.
When did $500,000 become a threat, Mr. Gobir?
Is that a threat?
[distorted voice] Ah, Mr. Gobir, when did $500,000 in cash become a threat?
Just cease all investigations.
Is there anything else?
No, sir.
Sule, I need you to do me a favor.
Can I trust you'll keep this between us?
Good. Now, it's very urgent. I would like you to...
You have five minutes, sir, don't exceed it, I could get into trouble.
[whispers] Mrs. Salami?
Mrs. Salami?
I need to speak with you. It's very urgent.
Did you kidnap and kill the family of Justice Nwachukwu?
[Gobir] I need you to be very, very honest with me.
Did you send me that bribe?
What does the truth matter?
Mrs. Salami, if it didn't, I wouldn't be here.

translation.en: Do not test God.
No, no, don't test God.
He's finally making me pay for my sins.
I accept it, Mr. Gobir.
Mrs. Salami, is this too your sin?
Did you order the kidnap and murder of Justice Nwachukwu's family?

translation.en: His wife and young children--
No!
I have many things on my conscience.
I refuse to let them add that to it.
But why would Justice Nwachukwu say it was you?
translation.ko: 근데 왜 응와추큐 판사가 살라미 씨를 지목했죠?

translation.en: Gobir...
there are many people in power

And are willing to do anything to make sure it happens.
translation.ko: 그걸 위해선 무슨 짓이든 다 하겠죠

translation.en: I have done many things...
unspeakable things in life.
translation.ko: 입에 담지 못 할 짓도 많이 했어요

translation.en: I did not
touch that man's family.
translation.ko: 그 사람 가족한텐 손댄 적 없어요

translation.en: I did not. Never.
I didn't.
I didn't.
I did not.
I did not.
I did not.
Yes, Dr. Shobanjo?
Mr. Gobir, we've had an emergency complication with your wife's health.
We need to take her into surgery straightaway.
All right, I will be with you immediately.
-Okay. -This is the file you asked for.
Thank you.
Okay, where are you? We need you to sign off on it immediately.
translation.ko: 네, 어디세요? 빨리 서류에 서명해야 하는데

translation.en: Okay, okay, please. I'll be there soon. I'll be there soon.
Hello, Detective Samuel?
Fantastic. Fantastic. Good. Do you know Silas Specialist Hospital?
translation.ko: 아주 좋아, 잘됐네 혹시 사일러스 전문 병원 알아?

translation.en: Okay, meet me there immediately. As soon as you can, please.
translation.ko: 좋아, 거기서 만나 가능한 한 빨리

translation.en: Yes, thank you.
No, no, no. We won't know anything for about three to four hours.
translation.ko: 아직이에요, 3-4시간은 더 있어 봐야 알 것 같습니다

translation.en: Mr. Gobir, I need you to understand that this will not solve the problem.
translation.ko: 고비르, 이렇게 한다고 아내분이 낫진 않아요

translation.en: It only buys your wife a little time.

translation.en: Yes.
It's a dire situation, sir.
I understand, Doctor. I'm working on it.
Please, tell Dr. Shobanjo I have to take care of something very urgent.
translation.ko: 쇼방조 선생님께 제가 급한 일이 있다고 전해주세요

translation.en: I'll be back before my wife leaves the theater.
Yes? When is our friend scheduled to move?
Ah. Oh. I will send an assoc--
I will send a friend of mine to visit her before then.
translation.ko: 내 친구를 보내서 그 전에 살라미 만나라고 할게

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Give him access and grant him smooth passage.
translation.ko: 그 친구가 편하게 들어갈 수 있게 자네가 신경 좀 쓰고

translation.en: Of course, sir.
Okay.
It is done.
[in Yoruba] Makanaki,
I hope this friendship we've started today will last a long time.
translation.ko: 오늘 시작된 우리 우정이 오랫동안 변함없길 바라네

translation.en: Isn't that so?
I will hold you to your promise.
What sort of insubordination is this, Gobir?
You come into my house without an appointment

In the last nine months, you have had in excess of 50 million naira,

translation.ko: 그쪽 통장에 꽂혔더군요 델텍 컨소시엄 이름으로요

translation.en: You've been spying on me?
Do you know who owns Deltec Consortium? Chief Durosimi.
But you and I know he's just a front man for the business...
Inspector Gobir!
...and Aare Akinwande.
Ah. This does not mean a thing.
He and I have been involved in some business ventures.
translation.ko: 아레랑 난 벤처 기업 때문에 일이 엮여서 그래

translation.en: Oh, really? But you did not see the last page. See here.
This contains the details of all the calls you made on the 13th of August 2017.
What?
You were careful to block your number,
translation.ko: 본인 번호를 발신자 표시 제한으로 해놔서

translation.en: making it untraceable for me on the other end.
translation.ko: 누가 전화를 했는지 제가 알 순 없었지만

translation.ko: 밤 11시 반에 이 번호로 전화한 기록 있죠?

translation.en: That is my number.
And that is the exact time I got the call bribing me
translation.ko: 돈 받았냐고 전화 왔던 시간과 일치하죠
